data.taskTitle: when user submits large messages they fail to send
when user submits large messages they fail to send
data.approach: Investigate shell escaping issues with large text input in tmux send-keys command. The current implementation uses simple shell escaping which may fail for large or special content.

data.taskTitle: when user submits large messages they fail to send
summary: Fixed large message input failure by switching from exec to execFile
Used tmux -l literal mode to bypass all shell escaping issues
Separated Enter key sending for text type inputs
reviewFocus: Verify large messages can now be sent via IDE input field

summary: Fixed large message input failure in /api/work/[sessionId]/input endpoint
Changed from exec() with shell escaping to execFile() with tmux literal mode (-l flag)
This eliminates shell interpretation issues with special characters in large messages
